lowVersionNotice: The version you are currently using is too low, which may cause some functions to be unavailable. Please update it in time
autoSaveNotice: Automatically saved, no need to save manually
404Title: The page you are visiting does not exist
403Title: You do not have permission to access this page
101Desc-1: The possible reasons for the failure to obtain the version are as follows:
101Desc-2: Something is wrong with your system
101Desc-3: The unofficial distribution you are using
101Desc-4: There are exceptions in the current version, please contact the publisher to update the version
103Desc-1: There may be reasons why your version is too low:
103Desc-2: You often use this system, and the browser has cached the old version. You can try to clear the browser cache or
103Desc-3: The server version is too low, please contact the publisher to update the version
103Desc-4: Your service provider has not updated the version for a long time, please contact the service provider to update the version
notSupportVersionNotice: The version you are using is lower than the minimum supported version of the server, please update it before use
underApproveMessage: Your {name} application is under review, please wait patiently
uploadTitle: Click or drag files to this area to upload
uploadDescription: Single or batch uploads are supported. Maximum {size}MB per file
leaveTitle-2: You have an unapproved leave application
leaveTitle-3: Your last leave request has been approved
leaveTitle-4: Your last leave application was denied
leaveDesc-1: Requesting reminder information, please check network connection if this information is displayed for a long time
leaveDesc-2: You can check the details in the leave record, or consult the superior department
leaveDesc-3: The last leave application you submitted has not yet reached the effective time. If there is any change, you can revise it in the leave record. Please note: the revised leave application will be re-approved
leaveDesc-4: The leave application you submitted last time has expired. If you have not cancelled your leave, please cancel it in time. If you have cancelled your leave, please ignore this message
leaveDesc-5: You are currently on vacation, and it is not recommended to submit a leave application again. If you need to modify the leave request time or leave cancellation time, you can modify it on the leave request record page. Please note: the revised leave request will be re-approved. If you are on leave, please ignore this message
leaveDesc-6: If you submit the same application as the last time, please contact the superior department first to avoid being rejected again
obtainLastTimeUploadWorkReport: Obtain last time upload work report
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete?
afterLogOutNeedLoginAgain: After log out, need login again
afterPassCannotChange: It cannot be changed after passing, please operate with caution
changeSuccessNotice: Password change success, please login again
changePasswordNotice: After changing the password, you need to log in again
sysErrorNotice: There is an error on the server, you can try the operation again, if the problem persists, please contact the administrator
noPermissionNotice: You do not have permission to perform this operation temporarily. If you confirm that you have permission, you can try the operation again. If the problem persists, please contact the administrator
changeUsernameNotice: After changing the username, you need to log in again
confirmDeleteUser: Are you sure you want to delete the user?
confirmDeleteUserNotice: It cannot be recovered after deleting a user, please operate with caution
confirmDeleteUserAgain: Is the last confirmation to delete the user?
confirmChangeProcessNotice: After the modification is successful, all new submitted applications will be approved according to the new process
tips-2: The web side supports dozens of functions including submitting applications, querying application records, approving applications, and user management.
tips-3: You can also access it through the mobile terminal, which supports functions such as querying application records, user management, and approving applications.
tips-4: Limited by mobile devices, some functions of the mobile terminal are unavailable。
tips-5: We recommend mobile phones, tablets and other devices to use the mobile terminal, and computers and other devices to use the web terminal.
tips-6: You can switch to the mobile terminal by clicking the button below.
lowBrowserVersion: Your current browser does not support the modern CSS Selectors feature. This system has suspended support for low-version browsers. Please update your current browser or change to a supported browser to visit. A modern browser is recommended (e.g. Chrome, Edge, Firefox, etc.)
confirmLogOut: Are you sure you want to log out?
token-1: Token is the global theme color, which is used to build the overall theme color of buttons, input boxes, tabs and other components.
token-2: At present, we provide a perfect dark mode and light mode, you can switch through the button on the left, or switch through the button floating in the lower right corner.
token-3: In order to meet the different needs of different users, we provide a color visualization option for building theme colors, which includes the styles of adjustable components on all pages. You can use this example to refer to and modify your global theme colors.
token-4: We provide preset theme colors in the following three sets
primaryThemeWarning: Usually, we only recommend changing the theme color
changeThemeTitle: Are you sure to modify the theme color?
changeThemeNotice: After modifying the theme color, the theme color of all pages will be modified (In order to ensure the normal use of some functions, some colors do not support modification). Currently, this function is an experimental function, and some unknown problems may occur, please be informed. If you have any problems during use, please restore the default theme in time.
tour-1: This is an OA system built using SSM + React + Ant Design, which includes functions such as employee leave application, approval, query, department/leader approval, query, etc., as well as administrator user management, process management, etc. Function. Support dark mode, language adjustment, theme color and other adjustments, you can view it on the settings page.
tour-2: You can submit an application. If the current application involves file upload, please pay attention to confirm the number and content of the file. File upload supports querying the last uploaded file. You can query your application records, we display your application records in the form of a table, and support key field search. For the submitted application, except for the application under approval, the application in other states does not support deletion.
tour-3: You can approve applications that require your approval. For rejected applications, you must provide reasons for the rejection, otherwise they cannot be submitted. If you are a department, you can also manage your department members, directly modify the user name, password or basic information for him/her, and you can even disable the user.
tour-4: You can manage users, modify user information, and disable users. You can also manage the approval process. Please note that the modified approval process will only be applied after the modification is successful, and the previously submitted applications will still follow the previous process.
